title: Lux Redesign / Model Updates Concept Art
body:
Hey everybody! I've had this Lux painting I made sitting in my hard drive for a while now and I figured I'd toss it up on the boards! I know Lux is far from the highest priority on the Visual Upgrade list, but I think eventually she would really benefit from a Sona/Cassiopeia tier model upgrade, at the very least.

http://41.media.tumblr.com/6485553ea52f1e25f77ef57d028e5bba/tumblr_nj0xveWRKt1qk32lpo2_r1_1280.png

Click the link if you want to see a larger size!

 I made some tweaks to her current design to make it a little more practical and sleek (to tie in with her espionage related activities in the lore) while still being ceremonial and pretty, and I tried to maintain an inherently Demacian theme to it! Her armor was inspired by the avian insignia on Garen's shoulder plates, as well as the Demacian crest in general.  I wanted it to be like, fashion meets function with a little bit of symbolic propaganda on the side. 

Also started some rough top down concepts, as well

http://41.media.tumblr.com/c5ae4800283e4f3d85db2e38e873fa66/tumblr_niz6lhgQAM1qk32lpo3_500.png

I hope you guys like it! Let me know what you think! If you're interested in seeing more of my stuff you can check me out on [tumblr ](http://hyliart.tumblr.com/) or [Patreon!](https://www.patreon.com/HYLIArt)

Bro...I'm in bed...unable to sleep and browsing forums. Then I see your post and I legit burst out laughing. Thank you for being a hero. :'D I love a good hearty laugh to something right up my sense of humor. With this being said....DAT FACE DOE. LMAO.

I'm a huge Lux fan; I probably have more games on her than any other champ in the game dating back to 2011. Any time I see anything pop up on the forums referencing skins ideas/retcon/etc. involving her I check it out, and a solid 90% of the time, I despise them. Lux has a very defined identity right now surrounding her extended lore and visuals, and a lot of the ideas that come around depict her as an over-joyful, nonsensical air-head.

That being said, I can't stress enough how **hard** you hit the nail on the head with this piece of work. It's absolutely phenomenal.

Lux is an intelligent, yet sad individual. She covers up her sadness with a joyful disposition. Your work doesn't depict sadness, but it also doesn't depict her as a sexualized, privileged, outgoing fool either. Her clothes are classy, yet functional as you said. Personally, I really like what you did with her hair style as well, it's not just draped over her back, but it's still long and has that braid in it. Overall, I think it makes her look more mature.

I really hope Riot doesn't scrap her [extended lore](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=53939) when they decide how they are going to update her; whether its a Poppy/Sion level (which I doubt, but given the time frame of all the other Champion updates that are currently in queue, you never know what kind of status she'll be considered when the time *does* come) or just a Viktor/Sona level. I can honestly say this is something to be remembered and referenced though. I could really appreciate a VU like this one, it captures everything visually.

Can I just pause for a moment to say how PHENOMENAL your work is? Ah, good, I can.

You took the hammer of creativity and really slammed home the nail of perfection here. Lux is a character that I not only use, but play frequently. Her splash art has always been meh to me, and her character model is clearly older. This is distinguishable by the way it sicks out as opposed to the rest of the environment. Characters with newer models (Rek'Sai, Ekko, etc.) fit in; their models flow with the background, if that makes sense. 

Now I've been looking at the comments, and I'm honestly a little disappointed. This IS talent, but _refined_ talent. Talent, much like a sword or axe, can be tempered by a forge of learning and improvement. Hard work and dedication serve as the designs, really bringing out the life and power. I'm just disappointed because one person's comment spawned such a large column of difference that really had no purpose. 

Again, I'd just like to say that you are one of the best artists that I've seen, _ever_. Keep flowing the amazing ideas and inspiring the arts.

P.S. Yeah, me again. I actually have a question this time. Would you be interested in drawing up any concept art? I don't have a reliable way to talk back and forth at the moment, but just dropping a comment on the boards under something I've posted or simply a reply to my comment will do.
